pr_title: Handle MethodHandle signature-polymorphic native methods for JITServer

timeline.message:
Handle MethodHandle signature-polymorphic native methods for JITServer

Signed-off-by: Dmitry Ten <Dmitry.Ten@ibm.com>

Handle MethodHandle signature-polymorphic native methods for JITServer

PR #10617 modified a number of methods of ResolvedMethod classes.
This commit implements these changes for JITServer

Closes: 10941

Signed-off-by: Dmitry Ten <Dmitry.Ten@ibm.com>

timeline.bodyText: This should be moved to getMethodNameAndSignatureFromConstantPool, and pass the cpIndex from bytecode to getMethodNameAndSignatureFromConstantPool
timeline.author: liqunl
